##  Privacy Policy

##  Information Collection:

When using Aurora, we collect device IDs related to your Philips Hue bridge
and Philips Hue lights.

We also collect the current settings of your bridge
and lights.

We don't collect personal identifiers like name or email unless
you're making a payment.
sharing:
Your data is stored securely and
is not shared with any third parties unless required by law.
